ygData.subject: Re: Galvatron makes an impact
ygData.msgSnippet: Galvatron smiled... A complement... Im glad we are allowed pleasentrese. He watched as the bot zoomed at him. He waited and waited until the bot was close

Received: from Kinger01030@... by imo-r09.mx.aol.com (mail_out_v28.35.) id a.9a.e71864d (4505) for <nbwrpg@egroups.com>; Sun, 7 Jan 2001 19:04:26 -0500 (EST)
Message-ID: <9a.e71864d.278a5e0a@...>
Date: Sun, 7 Jan 2001 19:04:26 EST
Subject: Re: Galvatron makes an impact
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 107
From: kinger01030@...

 Galvatron smiled... "A complement... Im glad we are allowed pleasentrese. He 
watched as the bot zoomed at him. He waited and waited until the bot was 
close enough.. (6ft) The green jewel on his chest glowed. He jumed up and did 
a mid air tuck and roll. The bot was still at full speed and wouldnt be able 
to adjust in time. He was above the bot he did a straight drop kick with full 
thruster speed about five feet from the bot. His flame sword was pulled 
straight down on the bots right arm.. His tail about 8 ft long. Shot  
underneath the bot's stomach and shot up. He was only 5 ft from the bot. This 
was done at an incredible pace. This move wasnt made to do sever damage but a 
special one. As the tail went for the bots left arm his flame energy  shot 
straight down at the bots  head. His green jewel turned off and shot  out a 
blast about 5 feet in width and 5 in length.
